title: What is the interpretation of a frog in a dream for a single woman?

preview.html:
Interpretation of a frog in a dream for a single woman. It has more than one meaning, as it is an amphibian that can live inside and outside of water. Therefore, some commentators spoke about this girl’s ability to adapt to society despite the circumstances to which she is sometimes exposed. Interpretation of a frog in a dream for a single woman. What is the interpretation of a frog in a dream? For a single woman? If a girl finds that her life has become difficult due to the loss of a loved one, such as a father or mother, for example, then seeing a frog in her dream bouncing from one place to another is a sign that her heart setbacks should end and she can find her life again. She continues on the path she started towards her ambitions, which will be a gift from her to those she lost and to those who care about her and wish her success.
ZOE.There is more than one color that a frog can appear in a person's dream. If she sees it in its beautiful green color, this is good news for her that her future holds many surprises. It also indicates the girl’s ability to coexist with circumstances, no matter how difficult they are, and her ability to overcome the difficulties she faces. As for the black frog, if she sees it in her dreams, she must now Be careful, she does not mind good faith, but rather thinks about the possibility of being betrayed by the other party. According to some interpreters, the dreamer is one of the personalities who has great potential and they may not know it or do not have much confidence in themselves, but if they give themselves a chance , they will show great success and have successful experiences with all standards. What is the interpretation of a frog in a dream for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin? The Imam did not stray far from what other commentators said. He said that the color of the frog controls the interpretation of the dream, and if the color green is dominant, then he must be sure of the step he has taken on his way to the future and continue the path without retreat or fear. If her ambitions are limited to marriage and raising children, then she will be an ideal mother and a good wife. Where he can create a loving and cohesive family while raising children on noble values ​​and morals. She also said that someone would want to marry her if she saw a frog jumping towards her and she was afraid of it and tried to run away, and therefore her agreement to marry this person would be a reason for her happiness in the future. Why does she wake up confused? When you find your interpretation, the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site, from Google. The most important interpretations of the frog in a single woman’s dream. Interpretation of a dream of a green frog for a single woman. According to what the girl wants and desires these days, if she is a science student, she will be very successful and will reach the highest levels for which she worked so hard. As for her engagement For a young man, but she is still hesitant to complete the marriage contract, then this dream is a good sign that she is suitable and will find comfort and happiness with him and no one else. A single girl dreams of a green frog living in her house, and in the coming days she will not find any sign of happiness and contentment. The girl will be able to deal with A problem you are exposed to, and this wisdom in dealing with it is the result of the experiences you have gained in the past period. But if you find it, Mi

title: Interpretation of seeing a woman giving birth in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we will learn about the interpretation of seeing a woman giving birth in a dream, as childbirth gives a new life to a person and childbirth brings happiness to the family environment because the arrival of a new person gives her a joy that was not there before. But what does seeing childbirth mean in a dream? Is it good news or a warning of evil? And does the vision of childbirth differ according to those who saw that vision? We will learn about all this in detail through the following lines on the Encyclopedia website, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a woman giving birth in a dream Symbol of childbirth in a dream Dream interpreters say that childbirth in a dream is one of the most promising dreams, because it means changing circumstances from ease to difficulty, and it also indicates a lot of sustenance and legal money. A woman who sees in her dream that she is giving birth at a time other than the time specified for her birth and suddenly this dream means that this woman will fall into many unexpected problems that will make her very sad. Seeing an unknown woman giving birth in a dream The interpretation of seeing childbirth differs from an unknown woman according to the condition in which the dreamer finds himself. A girl who sees in her dream a woman who does not know how to give birth to a male, this dream foretells the dreamer that she will soon marry a good man with whom she will live happily. If the newborn is a girl, this vision portends her an increase in food and money. If a married woman sees that there is a woman she does not know, and this woman gave birth in her dream to a beautiful and healthy child, and she was happy to see this child, then this dream indicates that God Almighty will grant this woman an abundance of goodness that will make life easier for her, God willing. If the newborn is sick and it is sad to see him, then this vision expresses that he will face some problems and troubles in his life in the near future, but there is no need to worry because they will be simple disagreements and will end in a few days. And the pregnant woman who sees in her dream that another woman she does not know will give birth, this vision tells her that her due date is approaching. But if he sees that the woman gave birth to a dead child, then this vision indicates that this woman will find some difficulties during her birth, but they will go away, God willing. A man sees in a dream that a woman he does not know is giving birth in his dream, this dream indicates that he is going through some difficulties and problems in his life and that childbirth is good news for him that he will be able to. Overcome these obstacles and problems, God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman giving birth without pain One of the promising visions for a pregnant woman is that she sees in her dream that God Almighty gives birth to her easily and painlessly. And if she suffers from any anxiety about pregnancy, this vision carries a message of reassurance that God Almighty will ease her burden and provide her with a child who pleases her eyes and will be a righteous son for her. Seeing my mother giving birth in a dream One of the non-serious visions for a man is to see in his dream that his mother gave birth to him again, as this vision symbolizes the death of the dreamer. The poor man who sees in a dream that his mother gives birth to him, this dream means that there is someone who takes care of him and takes care of him. And if the dreamer who sees this vision is a worker in the field of industry, it does not bode well

title: Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering a sheep in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a sheep being slaughtered in a dreamIt is known that slaughtering a sheep is an act of worship by which Muslims approach their Creator on Eid al-Adha, which is Eid al-Adha, to receive the reward of God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing a sheep being slaughtered in a dream and what are its implications for the viewer? You may also be interested in knowing more about bathing in a dream. What you will learn in detail in the following lines. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a sheep being slaughtered in a dream for a manInterpretation of seeing a sheep being slaughtered in a dreamIf a person dreams that he is slaughtering a sheep in his house, this indicates the arrival of livelihood and blessings that please him. If a young man who has not married sees in his dream that he is slaughtering a sheep, this is good news for him that the date of his marriage to the beloved girl is approaching. If a man sees that he is slaughtering a sheep to use in preparing a wedding feast, this is evidence that the monarch will save him from death, or an indication of escaping from a major problem. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is slaughtering a sheep, and this was done during a battle, this is evidence that the dreamer will be supported by God Almighty. Read also: Washing the deadInterpretation Seeing a sheep being slaughtered in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl dreams that she is slaughtering a sheep: If she is engaged, this indicates that her marriage is about to happen. If she sees a slaughtered sheep in her dream, this is a sign that she will get rid of psychological harm and get rid of heartache in the near future. If she dreams that she slaughtered a sheep herself and then skinned it, this is a sign that one of her relatives will get into trouble and needs her advice, and God knows best. If an unmarried woman sees a sheep in her dream, this is a sign that she will achieve kindness and goodness in her life. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is slaughtering a sheep and it is stained with blood, this is one of the visions that are unpleasant for her, and she will get into trouble. Read also: Penguin in a dream Interpretation of slaughtering a sheep in a dream for a divorced woman If a divorced woman sees in her dream that someone slaughtered a sheep on the days of Eid al-Adha, this is: It is a sign for her that she will receive good news. Seeing a divorced woman slaughtering a sheep on Eid al-Adha is a sign that she will start a new life with a trustworthy person. Interpretation of seeing A sheep is slaughtered in a dream for the deceased. Whoever sees that the deceased is slaughtering a sheep, this is a sign that the deceased has debts or a trust and wants the dreamer to pay them on his behalf and return the trust to its owners. Whoever sees in his dream that he is slaughtering a sheep for a deceased, this is a sign of a person’s recovery if he is sick, or the disappearance of his anxiety and relief from his distress if he is suffering from worries. If the dreamer sees in a dream that one of the dead is slaughtering a sheep, this is evidence that the deceased wants to send a message to the dreamer to give alms from his money to the poor and needy. Read also: Pregnancy in a dreamThe meaning of slaughtering a sheep in a dream for the sick If the patient sees in his dream that he is slaughtering a sheep, this is a sign of his recovery from his illness. If the patient sees in his dream that he is slaughtering a sheep, and if he has debts, this is a sign that he will be able to pay them off soon. Read also: Toilet in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a sheep being slaughtered in a dreamSeeing a sheep being slaughtered in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicates achieving goodness and repentance to God, as

title: Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a married woman breastfeeding a child. What is the interpretation of seeing a child breastfeeding in a dream, and does this vision indicate good or bad for the dreamer? It is one of the very important visions that carries many very important elements, but the interpretation of this vision varies according to whether the fortuneteller is a man or A single woman or girl, and in this article we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child for a married woman in different countries. Interpretation of seeing a child breastfeeding a married woman in a dream: If her son has passed his childhood and you see him breastfeeding, knowing that in reality they are searching for the appropriate treatment for his condition, then the dream indicates That he successfully recovered from these difficult circumstances, but there must be an important condition in the vision, which is that her son drank a lot of milk and felt full, but if she saw him he wanted to breastfeed from her, but her breasts were completely dry. This is a sign of his increasing illness or that he is going through bad financial and living conditions. If the son of the visionary woman works in one of the dangerous professions and she watches him while he is breastfeeding, then this is divine protection that he enjoys in his life and God will save him from the danger that was close to him. For him. If the visionary had a son working abroad and saw him breastfeeding, it was good news that he would return, and whenever he was breastfeeding her, the vision indicated that he would not travel again, but would rather live with his mother for many years. Some commentators argued that a woman who breastfeeds a man in In a dream, she will be falsely accused and this false accusation will make her suffer in her life. If she breastfeeds a man, and then breastfeeds a beautiful woman, the sign of the dream emphasizes her sadness over the great difficulties she will endure, then the situation will change, the sadness will disappear and the sun of victory will shine in her life. God willing. Interpretation of a vision of a married woman breastfeeding a male child. Some interpreters say that a woman breastfeeding a boy in a dream shows her sadness over her husband’s bad behavior and mistreatment and that unfortunately she will soon be freed from him. Another group of commentators stated that breastfeeding a boy from a married woman’s breast in a dream confirms The death of her husband and his exhaustion after his death. If the dreamer sees a child crying from hunger, breastfeed him immediately until he stops crying and when he feels comfortable sleeping, the dream indicates the best opinion that he is spending a lot of money on the poor and needy. If the child is breastfed in a dream, and he remains hungry, He needs more milk, as the meaning of sleep is prophecy, and a sign of abandoning his opinion about performing the obligation of zakat. He may be one of the people whom the Most Merciful has blessed with money, but he is stingy with God in giving alms to the poor, and unfortunately if he continues to do these actions he will be punished severely and God may steal it from him. . The blessing of money and its coverage of its scarcity and cruelty to the weak. Read also: Cutting hair in a woman’s dream. Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child for a married woman in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. If a married woman sees that she is breastfeeding a small child, this means that she will soon become pregnant and give birth to a child with these qualities. The presence of a large amount of milk in a woman’s breast Married is a description of happiness and much nourishment in life, and this vision could be a possibility

title: Interpretation of eating fish in a dream

preview.html: Through our website gptafser.com/, we will provide the interpretation of eating fish by showing the details of each person who sees this vision. Interpretation of the vision of eating fish in a dream for one girl: Eating tilapia fish in a dream for one girl. It is a sign of marriage to a person who has great authority. Whereas if a girl sees... For an unmarried woman in a dream, she eats a variety of fish. This is evidence of the abundance of food that will come to her in the near future, God willing. Seeing a fish in the river for a single girl in a dream. D- Obtaining money or a new employee that she will come to later, God willing. Interpretation of the vision of eating grilled fish in a single girl’s dream. A lot of good will come along the way, and perhaps success and success in her life in general. If an unmarried girl eats a live fish as she leaves the sea in a dream. The dream indicates that she will obtain a major position that will change her life, with permission. God. It was said in a dream that he was eating grilled fish for a single girl. It is one of the dreams that means that the person who had the vision will have great wisdom and knowledge. If he saw that he was eating fried fish in a dream with a girl. The vision showed the achievement of the goals and aspirations that he was hoping for. See also : Seeing fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees a married woman eating fish in a dream, many symbols may arise from it. As seeing eating grilled fish are symbols and indicators of goodness, God willing. Whereas if a married woman sees in a dream She is eating fried fish with her husband. The vision showed the pregnancy that she will bear and the husband and wife will be happy, God willing. If he sees that he is eating fried fish after cooking in a married woman’s dream. The vision showed many positive things that will happen to her in her life. Seeing yourself eating live fish in The dream may symbolize a married woman. About goodness and the extension of maintenance, and it may indicate the repayment of debts, God willing. The dream of eating fresh fish in a married woman’s dream looms on the horizon. For good news, and perhaps for hearing good news in general, God willing. The vision of eating fish, whether it is fried or Grilled is considered in a married woman’s dream. It is one of the greatest dreams for her, and that is also thanks to God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing eating fish in a dream about a man and its meaningHe sees himself eating grilled fish in a married man’s dream. It is a sign of goodness that is coming to his household, and it is an occasion to enter In this good and plentiful food. Interpretation of seeing grilled fish with his wife in a married man’s dream. It is a sign of existing cooperation between the two sides and may indicate calm and family stability. If a married man sees that he is eating live fish when it comes out of the water in a dream. The vision means that he will With great work that brings him abundant sustenance thanks to Almighty God. When a married man sees that he is eating a big fish in a dream. The vision may indicate that he will find a new job that will bring him a lot of money. Eating fresh fish when it comes out of the water in a married man’s dream. Good news and some... The positive changes that will happen to him in the few days

It is a sign of the good that comes to his family, and it is an occasion to enter into this good and abundant food. Interpretation of seeing grilled fish with the wife in a married man's dream. A sign of Cooperation between the two sides and may indicate calm and family stability. If a married man sees that he is eating live fish when it comes out of the water in a dream. The vision means that he will do a great job that will bring him abundant sustenance, thanks to God Almighty. When a married man sees that he is eating a large fish in a dream. The vision may indicate that he will find a new job that will bring him a lot of money. Eating fresh fish when it comes out of the water in a married man’s dream. Good news and some positive changes that will happen to him in the next few days.

title: The 50 most important interpretations of seeing a slaughtered chicken in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a slaughtered chicken in a dream Chicken is one of the birds that everyone loves, as it can be eaten in many different forms, and we see that the dream has different meanings between happiness and sadness, so we will discover during this the interpretation of seeing a slaughtered chicken in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing a slaughtered chicken in a dream The interpretation of a dream of slaughtered chicken in a dream appears: There is Failure in the life of the dreamer. His ability to deceive everyone around him. Seeing the different shapes of chickens means happy news for the fortuneteller that his life will change. Interpretation of seeing chickens slaughtered in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin sees important interpretations of this dream, which are: If the dreamer sees this vision, then this It indicates divorce between spouses. As for slaughtering chickens, it means being deceived and deceived by those close to him. When he dreams that he is selling chickens, this indicates happiness in his life. When a person dreams that he is hunting chickens, this means that he will obtain abundant and good food in his life. If The dreamer sees that he is slaughtering a chicken while he is not married, then this indicates the imminence of his marriage. If the dreamer eats this chicken, this indicates a great benefit for him. When the dreamer sees that he is eating this chicken in his dream, especially from the breast, this indicates a suitable job opportunity for him, or perhaps Traveling. If he eats in the dream from the groin area, this represents good morals and excessive kindness to his wife. Fried or grilled chicken indicates the presence of many benefits for the fortuneteller. When you eat chicken in a dream, this symbolizes the presence of many crowns for the fortuneteller, but if he eats only the head, this indicates On the death of a female relative. Interpretation of seeing chickens slaughtered in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of this vision says: If a person dreams of slaughtering a black chicken, this indicates his marriage to a virgin. Seeing young chickens slaughtered indicates the birth of children from an illegitimate relationship. But when he eats this chicken , it represents abundant sustenance awaiting him in the future. Hearing the sound of chickens in a dream means that the dreamer will fall into many sins. Interpretation of seeing a slaughtered chicken in a dream for a single woman: This dream indicates her marriage and her happiness in that marriage, as well as expressing her sadness over her family’s anger at her. The vision shows her ability to Overcoming any difficulties in her field of study, as she achieves great success as a result of her persistence and perseverance. Interpretation of a dream about a pure and slaughtered chicken for a single woman: If she sees that there is a man offering her this chicken, this indicates that she will marry someone suitable for her. This dream indicates this girl’s happiness and stability to an extent Big. But if she bought it, cleaned it, and smelled good in the dream, this indicates her excellence and success in her studies. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning a slaughtered chicken for a single woman: If she sees that she is cleaning a lot of chickens, this confirms that she will get rid of difficulties in her life. When she dreams that she is cleaning a chicken for cooking and eating, This indicates the abundance of food and great happiness in her life. Interpretation of seeing a slaughtered chicken in a dream for a married woman: This dream expresses her strong personality that makes her capable of controlling everything around her. If this chicken is black, this means

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a fan of Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Even the dream interpretations of the well in general symbolize depth in thought and mystery, as it indicates sustenance and the acquisition of many benefits and good things, including money and children, but there are some indications present in the vision that lead to the dreamer’s closest appearance to evil, which is to be careful. The interpretation of the dream of the well has been done. Discrimination is a result of the dreamer’s condition and other circumstances. Interpretation of a dream about a well by Ibn Sirin. Even dream interpretations. Interpretation of a well in a dream shows that the dreamer has a good reputation among the people around him, and if someone sees that the well is closing, this is evidence that there are those around him who are deceiving him and lying to him. Whoever sees himself He is trying to escape from it, as this is a sign that he has made a great effort to earn a lot of money and change his circumstances. If the dreamer sees a reflection of his image in the water of the well, the vision indicates that he will be exposed to a difficult problem that will disturb him in his life. Standing in the well symbolizes his lack of trust in those around him and his lack of His constant trust in them. Interpretation of a dream about a well by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that the interpretation of seeing a well in a person’s dream symbolizes that he will acquire knowledge that will benefit him or great wealth or that his wedding date will approach. This dream indicates that the dreamer is in a crisis and is suffering from severe distress and will lead to... Comfort after a person falls into great injustice and refers to the owner of the house who spends on his family. The dreamer entering the bottom of the well symbolizes his commitment to achieving a specific goal in an organized and thoughtful way, and drawing it and leaving it with a lot of water in a dream indicates one’s ability to achieve one’s dreams, desires and aspirations. . You will find all interpretations of Ibn Sirin’s dreams and visions on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site from Google. Interpretation of a dream about a well for a single woman. The interpretation of a well in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she will soon marry a man with high morals, and if the unmarried woman sees that the well does not contain water, this indicates On her desire to get married and enter into a romantic relationship. In the current period, if a girl falls and sees someone saving her, this indicates that a young man will propose marriage to her soon, and if the well is deep and dark and does not contain water, this indicates that he is suffering from a difficult psychological crisis because of it. . She is exposed to many problems and misfortunes in her life. Her exit from the well symbolizes her leaving her father’s house to marry or travel. Interpretation of a dream about a well for a married woman. Interpretation of a married woman who sees a well in a dream is a sign of her husband. Not being able to get out of it indicates that he has been suffering from a problem for a while. And he has not been able to solve it yet. If she falls into a very deep water well, this indicates that she is falling in love with her husband, who is considered a source of security and safety for her. Interpretation of a dream about a well filled with water for a married woman: If a married woman sees a well filled with water, this vision is considered good news that she will hear Soon the news of her pregnancy, and it indicates that she will have a lot of money and earnings and profits will increase. If a woman leaves a well in a dream, this means that she will leave her husband’s house. Interpretation of a dream about a well for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees a well

title: What is the interpretation of seeing the number 19 in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman?

preview.html: Number 19 in a single woman’s dream: The appearance of numbers in a dream is one of the symbols that jurists are confused about their interpretation of, as seeing the number in writing differs from seeing it in money, whether paper or metal, and each number has different connotations, and in this article I explain to you the interpretations of seeing number 19 in a dream to know What this number brings. Good signs or warnings of some upcoming problems. What is the interpretation of dream number 19 in a dream? Do you know the number of letters of the first verse revealed in the Holy Quran? Do you remember the number of letters in the Basmala? It is about interpreting your vision. Some interpreters confirm that seeing the number 19 heralds a new beginning, and that it is a good and successful beginning, God Almighty, and they based this interpretation on the fact that the number of letters in the Basmala is 19, they confirm this. For yourself, in the name of God, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful. If the dreamer is on the cusp of a new stage in his life, but anxiety about the future can control him and his thinking at the present time, and he sees this number in his dream, then he is on clear steps and will be able. To reach his goal if he continues on his path without paying attention to the constant criticism of others. The opinion of another group of jurists was that this number is an unwanted vision, and it can symbolize disagreement, and seeing it is a warning against certain mistakes committed by the viewer, whether intentionally or unintentionally, but it He gets angry with those around him, and he gets angry with those around him. It makes them stay away from him, and perhaps it is time for him to review himself and try to identify these negative points and get rid of them gradually. Interpretation of seeing the number 19 in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing the number 19 specifically indicates the continuation of disagreement and enmity between two people, if the fortuneteller is in disagreement with Someone may be wrong and this person is only suitable for him, so it is better to reconsider. Things from another point of view so that she can end this conflict and get rid of its consequences forever. As for the dreamer who may be tempted by some of her friends who do not care about matters of religion or the morals and customs of the society in which she grew up, seeing this number more than once in a dream may be a message to her. . To monitor her behavior recently, and avoid those friendships that have the effect of moving away from the right path that she is accustomed to. Number 19 in the dream of a single woman. You still do not find an interpretation of your dream? Go to Google and search for the Egyptian dream interpretation website. What does it mean for a pregnant woman to see the number 19 in a dream? Number 19 in a pregnant woman’s dream. The majority of jurists explained three main clues around which the interpretation of seeing this number in a pregnant woman’s dream revolves around: The first evidence: that it is an odd number, and often Individual numbers are not mentioned. Pregnancy with a girl. If the mother is expecting a male child, seeing this number indicates that her child will be a little stubborn and may suffer a lot in raising him, but in the end he will have good character and a good son within her. The second meaning: which is passing that stage. In which he suffered from many problems and pain, psychological or physical, and it portends improvement. In general, if she sees the number written in the sky and is overcome by feelings of contentment.

title: Interpretation of a dream about pieces of meat coming out of the mouth in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about lumps of meat coming out of the mouth? Interpretation of a dream about lumps of meat coming out of the mouth in a dream. Seeing meat coming out of the mouth is related to the dreamer falling into magic or not? Is seeing black liquid coming out of the mouth interpreted as evangelism or not? Many details and questions about this scene are running through the dreamer's mind, you will find their answers in the article below. Do you have a confused dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about pieces of meat coming out of the mouth. If the dreamer sees in his dream lumps of meat coming out of his mouth, this is a clear warning to him to stop oppressing people and usurping their rights because he is exposed to God’s severe wrath and the price he pays as a result. His bad deeds will be dear. If God lives miserable, finds obstacles and difficulties everywhere, and does not even know why he suffers in his life to this extent? But if the dreamer knows that he is actually bewitched, and sees in his dream pieces of rotten meat coming out of his mouth, and after that he feels comfortable as if he was born again, then the dream foretells that he will recover from dangers. Ibn Sirin did not mention clear explanations for seeing lumps of meat coming out of the mouth, but some jurists said: If meat comes out of the mouth of the sick dreamer in a dream, then he will die soon. Ibn Sirin said that if The dreamer saw clots of blood coming out of his mouth in a dream, then the vision indicates a serious illness that he will suffer from for a long time. Ibn Sirin mentioned in his texts that anything good coming out of the dreamer’s mouth in a dream, such as honey, good food, etc., then the interpretation of the vision will be promising and show morals. What is good for the dreamer and his kind words is that he speaks to people, and this may be the reason why everyone gathers around him because he does not just speak well. Interpretation of dreams about pieces of meat coming out of the mouth of a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees a lot of pieces of meat coming out of her mouth without stopping in the dream, then the vision It is interpreted as intense envy that surrounds her and destroys many aspects of her life. If the meat that came out of the unmarried woman’s mouth was filled with blood so that her clothes were soiled in the dream, then it is dangerous and evil that she will find it soon. If the unmarried woman dreams that she puts a piece of rotten meat in her mouth, which will make her It smells bad, and when she takes it out of her mouth, this smell goes away and the dreamer feels comfortable. The vision indicates harm. Whoever suffered insight, will soon leave.If an unmarried woman is bewitched in reality and dreams of a piece of meat in her mouth that prevents her from breathing and she wanted to take it out of her mouth in a dream but could not, then she asked someone for help. The family members and the meat took it out of her mouth, and she was able to breathe it later. This is magic that she cannot remove on her own, and she will seek help from a truly religious man, and may God bless her. Get well soon. Interpretation of a dream about pieces of meat coming out of a married woman’s mouth: A barren dreamer. If she dreams that she is taking meat out of her mouth, the vision is interpreted as being bewitched, and magic can be a reason for stopping having children, and God knows best. Since raw meat
